entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:46 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
